query: SELECT 'Total alunos' as metrica, CAST(COUNT(*) AS CHAR) as valor FROM alunos UNION ALL SELECT 'Com mentoria', CAST(COUNT(DISTINCT alunoId) AS CHAR) FROM mentoring_sessions UNION ALL SELECT 'Sem mentoria', CAST(COUNT(*) AS CHAR) FROM alunos WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT alunoId FROM mentoring_sessions)
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2kPX7CjhqdMFT8y.9c22f9f54902 --database 5n7arrGNHjNdoFCMzyGXcY --execute SELECT 'Total alunos' as metrica, CAST(COUNT(*) AS CHAR) as valor FROM alunos UNION ALL SELECT 'Com mentoria', CAST(COUNT(DISTINCT alunoId) AS CHAR) FROM mentoring_sessions UNION ALL SELECT 'Sem mentoria', CAST(COUNT(*) AS CHAR) FROM alunos WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT alunoId FROM mentoring_sessions)
